detectors.description:
DeadMansSwitch.DeadMansSwitch(address,address,uint256)._owner () lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = _owner ()

DeadMansSwitch.setBackup(address)._backup () lacks a zero-check on :
		- backup = _backup ()

DeadMansSwitch.DeadMansSwitch(address,address,uint256)._backup () lacks a zero-check on :
		- backup = _backup ()

DeadMansSwitch.setOwner(address)._owner () lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = _owner ()
Modifier DeadMansSwitch.when_timed_out() () does not always execute _; or revert
detectors.markdown: Modifier [DeadMansSwitch.when_timed_out()]() does not always execute _; or revert

detectors.description: Modifier DeadMansSwitch.when_no_timeout() () does not always execute _; or revert
detectors.markdown: Modifier [DeadMansSwitch.when_no_timeout()]() does not always execute _; or revert

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in DeadMansSwitch.send(address,uint256,bytes) ():
	External calls:
	- ! _to.call.value(_value)(_data) ()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Sent(_to,_value,_data) ()
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [DeadMansSwitch.send(address,uint256,bytes)]():
	External calls:
	- [! _to.call.value(_value)(_data)]()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [Sent(_to,_value,_data)]()

detectors.description:
DeadMansSwitch.reclaimStarted() () uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- timeout != 0 ()
detectors.markdown:
[DeadMansSwitch.reclaimStarted()]() uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [timeout != 0]()

detectors.description:
DeadMansSwitch.canFinalize() () uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- timeout != 0 && now > timeout ()
detectors.markdown:
[DeadMansSwitch.canFinalize()]() uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [timeout != 0 && now > timeout]()

detectors.description:
DeadMansSwitch.timeLeft() () uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- now > timeout ()
detectors.markdown:
[DeadMansSwitch.timeLeft()]() uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [now > timeout]()

detectors.description:
